title: Paulo Junichi Tanaka
text:
is a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player for <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Matsumoto%20Yamaga%20FC">Matsumoto Yamaga</a>.
Personal life.
His mother is <a href="Filipinos">Filipino</a> from <a href="Cotabato">Cotabato</a>, while his father is a Japanese from the <a href="Hyogo%20Prefecture">Hyogo Prefecture</a>.
Club statistics.
"Updated to end of 2018 season".
